welcome_new_user: Welcome! Let's set up your profile. Please choose your preferred language:
invalid_language: Invalid choice. Please choose your preferred language:
invalid_region: Invalid region selected. Please choose from the list.
country_not_found_in_region: Country not found in the selected region. Please choose from the list or type the full name carefully.
profile_complete: Thank you! Your profile is complete.
payment_prompt:
To activate advanced partner search, please make a payment to one of the following accounts:
Payeer: {payeer_account}\nBitcoin: {bitcoin_address}\nAfter payment, please click the button below and send your transaction ID or a screenshot to the admin for verification.
payment_received_pending_verification: Your payment information has been received and is awaiting verification by the admin. You will be notified once the feature is activated.
feature_activated: Advanced partner search feature has been activated for your account!
search_partner_prompt_language: What language are you looking for in a partner?
search_partner_prompt_gender: What gender are you looking for in a partner?
search_partner_prompt_country: What country are you looking for a partner from? (Type region name first, or 'Any Country')
search_results_none: No partners found matching your criteria.
admin_payment_verified: Payment verified for user {user_id}. Feature activated.
error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
feature_already_activated: You already have the premium feature activated.
payment_send_proof: Please send your transaction ID, payment screenshot, or any other proof of payment now. The admin will review it shortly.
payment_rejected: Unfortunately, your payment could not be verified at this time. Please contact support or try again.
profile_incomplete: Please complete your profile using /start before searching for partners.
invalid_gender: Invalid gender selected. Please choose from the list.
payment_send_proof_reminder: Please send transaction ID or screenshot as proof of payment.
search_partner_prompt_region_for_country: First, choose a region for the partner's country, or choose 'Any Country'.
search_partner_select_country_from_regio: Now, please choose a country from {region} for your partner, or type 'Any Country' if you chose that region.
menu_hidden: ‚úÖ Menu hidden. Type /menu to show it again.
help_start: Start the bot and create your profile
help_additional_info: For further assistance, contact our support team.
premium_feature_1: Advanced partner search by region and country
user_not_found: User not found or no longer available.
contact_request: {name} wants to contact you! They speak {language}.
contact_request_sent: Contact request sent to {name}. You will be notified when they respond.
contact_accepted: {name} accepted your contact request! You can now contact them directly: @{username}
contact_accepted_confirmation: You have accepted the contact request from {name}. They can now contact you directly.
contact_declined_confirmation: You have declined the contact request from {name}.
language_changed: Your language has been changed to English.
